articles.title: Powerball: Lotto fever grips US for $1.6bn world record prize - BBC
articles.description: One in 292 million odds of winning have not deterred hopeful Americans from snapping up their tickets.
articles.content:
After more than three months without a winner in the premier lottery game in the US, this weekend's draw has grown to the biggest the world has ever seen.
The Powerball jackpot advertised for Saturd… [+1666 chars]

articles.author: Caitlin Tilley
articles.title: Covid vaccination proof still required to enter America in 2023 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) has extended the rule in the US until at least January 8 next year to 'limit the risk of Covid-19, including variants of the virus'.
articles.content:
Travelers flying into the United States will still need proof of Covid vaccination in 2023 making the US the only country in the West to stick by the failing policy.
The Transportation Security Admi… [+5390 chars]

articles.title: American Jailed For 4 Weeks For Slapping Singapore Airlines Crew Member - NDTV
articles.description: An American whose bomb hoax on a commercial flight prompted Singapore to scramble fighter jets was sentenced to four weeks in prison today, after a court found him guilty of causing hurt by slapping a cabin crew member.
articles.content:
The plane had to be escorted to Singapore by fighter jets. (Representational)
